products.title: Stripe
products.excerpt: Accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB, and Diners Club cards directly on your store.

products.title: Amazon Pay
products.excerpt: Amazon Pay is embedded in your WooCommerce store. Transactions take place via Amazon widgets, so the buyer never leaves your site.

products.title: PayFast Payment Gateway
products.excerpt: Take payments on your WooCommerce store via PayFast (redirect method).

products.title: ShipStation Integration
products.excerpt: Fulfill all your Woo orders (and wherever else you sell) quickly and easily using ShipStation, the #1 choice for online retailers. Try it free for 30 days today!

products.title: Facebook for WooCommerce
products.excerpt: Get the Facebook for WooCommerce plugin for two powerful ways to help grow your business.

products.title: PayPal Powered by Braintree
products.excerpt: Accept PayPal, credit cards and debit cards with a single payment gateway solution — PayPal Powered by Braintree.

products.title: Klarna
products.excerpt: Give your customers the simplest buying experience with Klarna and achieve amazing checkout conversions

products.title: PayPal Express Checkout
products.excerpt: Add PayPal to your web checkout so your customers can pay from any device.

products.title: WooCommerce Taxamo
products.excerpt: Manage and track EU VAT rules to keep your shop in line with the new European law.

products.title: WooCommerce AvaTax
products.excerpt: Get 100% accurate sales tax calculations and on time tax return filing. No more tracking sales tax rates, rules, or jurisdictional boundaries.

products.title: Inspire Payment Gateway
products.excerpt: Accept transactions from all major credit cards including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, Diners Club, and JCB.

products.title: Coupon Shortcodes
products.excerpt: Show coupon discount info using shortcodes. Allows to render coupon information and content conditionally, based on the validity of coupons.

products.title: WooCommerce Bundle Style Coupons
products.excerpt: Enables store owners to make a coupon only apply when all products required for it are in the cart.

products.title: Photos Product Tab
products.excerpt: Allows you to display all the images you have attached to a product in a new tab on the single product page.

products.title: Product Archive Customiser
products.excerpt: Allows you to customise WooCommerce product archives.

products.title: Putler Connector
products.excerpt: Connect WooCommerce with Putler - the best sales analytics app. Synchronize orders and instantly get X-ray vision on your business!

products.title: Total Web Solutions Gateway
products.excerpt: Accept Credit and Debit card payments for your store with Total Web Solutions Secure PayPage.

products.title: InstantSearch+ for WooCommerce
products.excerpt: Add the fastest, most advanced, cloud-based search to your WooCommerce store, and see your conversion rates go up.

products.title: Product Details Customiser
products.excerpt: Customise WooCommerce product details pages. Show / Hide core components like product imagery, tabs, upsells & related products.

products.title: OrderCup
products.excerpt: Print Shipping Labels with 1 click. USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL, Canada Post.  Up to 70% off on USPS and DHL rates. Fully web based. Ship from any Country!
